core.title: remoteCP :: Dedicated Server Remote Control Panel
core.noscript: Your browser does not support JavaScript, but this is absolutly essential for the use of remoteCP
core.mysqlerr1: Connection to the mysql server missed
core.deflanguage: Language file not found, trying to use default language
core.accessnoserver: no open servers available, login not possible
core.accessrefused: Server connection refused, Server not reachable or wrong connection settings
core.accessrefusedusr: Server connection refused, invalid SuperAdmin accountname
core.accessrefusedpsw: Server connection refused, invalid SuperAdmin password
core.offlinelogininfo: Serverconnection not available! remoteCP turned to offline-mode, this is not a error message!
